alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 03 at 8:42PM CST until February 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County. Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Leflore and Carroll Counties. For the Lower Yazoo ...including Whaley, Greenwood, Belzoni, Yazoo City, Sunflower, Anguilla...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sunflower River At Sunflower. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Farm roads to catfish ponds become inundated. Jeffcoat road west of river gage floods * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 22.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Sunflower River Sunflower 21.0 22.0 Fri 7 pm CST 22.5 22.4 22.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 845 AM CST.
